title: U.S. Tip-Toes Closer To Unprecedented Fine On French Banking Giant
teaser: The U.S. government is reportedly nearing a settlement with BNP Paribas, drawing to a potential end allegations that the French bank hid $30 billion in transactions involving countries that violated U.S. sanctions.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
